name: Solar System (itch) (shyamagoel)
description:
This is my Solar System Project. I have added all the planets and pluto . . I have added the y-axis to make them look more realistic. I have added 3d audio to most of the planets and increased the range and intensity of the point light in sun. I Have uploaded the project in all 3 formats but tested it out only in windows as it was the only one I had. 

Credits - 

Made by Shyama Goel
